title: Ticket #954: Improve hold reason when cream job fails
description: When a Cream server reports a job failure, the gridmanager puts the job on hold with a hold reason of 'Unspecified gridmanager error'. The Cream server includes a human-readable failure message, which should be propagated to the hold reason.
